original_title: Baby Lamb and Friends: The Movie
overview: The Dark Slayer may look threatening, but in actuality he is a very lousy villain. So, he sets out to prove to everyone in Capitol City that he is a real villain by plotting to destroy the town and rule its people with an iron fist. Baby Lamb and all of his friends don't believe him until The Dark Slayer proves them wrong and kidnaps everyone. The rest of the gang seek vengeance, but Baby Lamb realizes something serious about The Dark Slayer.
title: Baby Lamb and Friends: The Movie
